abstract: Luxembourg Prime Min Xavier Bettel marries Belgian architect Gauthier Destenay, first same-sex marriage of European Union leader; marriage points to changing attitude in the predominantly Catholic duchy, and happens less than year after Luxembourg legalized such marriages.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Xavier Bettel’s wedding to a Belgian architect took place less than a year after Luxembourg legalized same-sex marriages.

headline.main: Luxembourg Premier Is First E.U. Leader to Marry Same-Sex Partner
headline.print_headline: In an E.U. First, a Premier Weds His Same-Sex Partner

snippet: Prime Minister Xavier Bettel’s wedding to a Belgian architect took place less than a year after Luxembourg legalized same-sex marriages.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
